title: [Self-Directed] Multimedia Resource Organization Strategies for Customized e-Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic e-learning platform utilization skills and experience with multimedia production tools
context.additional_context: A course focusing on strengthening competency in designing work-integrated learning for current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can classify and tag various types of web-based multimedia resources according to situational context
Learners can analyze SCORM/IMS standard-based content packaging structures for application to personalized learning paths
Learners can design personalized learning modules combining multimedia resources based on individual learning style diagnostic results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
